We need easy access to affordable & good quality healthcare INCLUDING sexual healthcare INCLUDING abortion. Help us get it. Women are dying.
If you're a dude who isn't familiar with this stuff stand up and listen and get involved in this stuff. This affects you!! Get involved.
Think it can't happen here? Think again. We must constantly fight for our rights to access to birth control, gyno services & abortion.
